data.title: Tablets and Laptops for Sale: Shop Today
data.meta_description: Tablets and laptops help you stay connected to email, play games, edit documents, and more. Find the perfect one today.
data.text:
Tablets are a great choice for users who are looking for a new electronic device that has a bigger screen but share many of the same features and versatility as a cell phone. Being lighter than most laptops, tablets are the perfect in between size that promotes productivity and portability. Additionally, with Verizon's tablet connected device plan, you will be able to use your iPad, Samsung Galaxy Tab, or other tablet device without having to connect to WiFi. That means you can catch up on your favorite shows, send a work email, play games, and keep your kids entertained no matter where you are.

One of the best features of tablets is that they can pair seamlessly with your smartphone. For users with iPhones, iPads can either sync with all of your phone's content or you can choose to only sync specific items, so you will never be out of the loop on your latest notifications. Similarly, users with Samsung Galaxy phones can pair their phone to any Samsung Galaxy Tab to make sure both devices always have the latest information.

There are also plenty of kid-friendly tablets available, such as the TCL tablets, which allow your child to do everything from play educational games to connect with their friends and family members via video calls. Additionally, we regularly put tablets on sale, which is just another reason why you should buy your tablet through Verizon.

Buy laptops and connect them to a device plan

For those who may already have a tablet or need a more powerful option to run multiple programs at once, a laptop may be the better option. With higher performing processors and greater storage capacity, laptops are a great option for those who need to complete a large amount of work-related tasks.

Verizon has a variety of laptops to choose between, from brands like Samsung, Lenovo, and Orbic. The best part? We offer laptop data plans to keep your device connected even without WiFi, making it easy to stay online even when you are on the go. You can connect your laptop to the Verizon 5G/4G LTE and 5G Ultra Wideband networks with our Unlimited or our More Unlimited plans.

In addition to tablets and laptops, you can connect your smartwatch, hotspot, and other devices to Verizon's network. Learn more about our different plan options to see how you can stay connected through all of your devices on Verizon's network.
